publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: weave; pleat (sandals etc); produce by stitching etc
heavenly regions; the heavens; the heavenly realm
(primarily visible, outer) clothes (worn on the upper part of the body)
have the time to, have the opportunity to
also with preposed object: take proper care of, put in proper order
=憐 took pity on the situation S
drag along; pull towards one; pull forward
get married off to the contextually determinate N
cease to do; stop to do something, abandon an aktivity
get angry at; show anger at 怒於
give official orders for N to V

tls:text.tls:line: He gave her an official order to return to Milky Way East,

sense.def: return to (where one really belongs etc.)
let (someone do something) NB: the un-negated cases are crucial. The negated cases can possibly be explained by NEG-raising.)
this; marking embedded sentential objects: that this
take the initiative for a meeting with (another party)
poetic: enjoy (the moon etc) 永弄 "enjoy forever"

seg.line: 二日而香變，三日而味變，四五日外，色香味盡去矣。

sense.def: time: beyond the time-span designated by N, after N

sense.def: change to the worse> decline, go off

seg.line: 如醴如酪。大略如彼，其實過之。若離本枝，一日而色變，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 如醴如酪。大略如彼，其實過之。若離本枝，一日而色變，
tls:text.tls:line: like sweet wine, and like sweet and sour rice sauce. By and large it is like that, but in reality it is more than that. Once it leaves the twig on which it is hanging, then on the first day its colour will change.

sense.def: change to the worse> decline, go off

seg.line: 枇杷，殼如紅繒，膜如紫綃，瓤肉潔白如冰，雪漿液甘酸，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 枇杷，殼如紅繒，膜如紫綃，瓤肉潔白如冰，雪漿液甘酸，
tls:text.tls:line: pípá fruit. The shell is like red silk, the membrane skin is like red raw silk, the fuitmeat is pure white like ice and snow, the juice is sweet and sour

tls:text.tls:line: The leaves are like those of the gui-tree and evergreen. The flowers are like those of the orange tree, blossoming in the spring. The fruits are like cinnamon, ripening in the summer. The blossoms are like the wine-plant, and the kernels are like the

seg.line: 頭大尹不自由左右問之良久荅曰達奚尹訴冤我求

tls:text.tls:srcline: 頭大尹不自由左右問之良久荅曰達奚尹訴冤我求
